## What Gets Set Up

When you run the setup script, you get:

- ğŸ”‘ SSH keys for GitHub (no passwords!)
- âš¡ Helpful aliases (`dav1d`, `dav1d-edit`, etc.)
- ğŸ“ Workflow scripts for common tasks
- ğŸ Python environment with all dependencies
- â˜ï¸ GCP project configuration

## Manual Setup

Prefer to set up manually?

```bash
# In Cloud Shell
curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YOUR_USERNAME/Dav1d/main/dav1d%20brain/cloud_shell_setup.sh | bash
```

Or see [full instructions](./CLOUD_SHELL_SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md).
